resources.string: Answer these 5 questions to check if you are well prepared for your biochemistry classes!
1. Which of the amino acids below is described properly? (1 p.)
2. Which of the amino acids below is not synthesized from aspartate? (1 p.)
a. Enzymatic degradation of phenylalanine requires biopterin as a cofactor.
b. People with defects in phenylalanine catabolism require tyrosine intake.
c. Unability to hydroxylate phenylalanine results in its higher concentration in blood and in intellectual disability.
5. Choose from the amino acids below and fill the gaps (in alphabetical order). (3 p.)

string.name: q5aa
string.b: Trp, Asp, Asn, Phe, Val, Ile, Met, His, Glu, Gln, Leu, Gly, Ala

resources.string: Carbon chain of some amino acids can be introduced to TCA cycle (picture) as different compounds. Which amino acids can be introduced as:
